title: Felix
description: I have a secret. Twelve years ago I crushed on my teammate’s little sister, before firmly putting her in the friend zone. Which then became the best friend zone. And my teammate became more of a brother.But now we have two problems.1. I just found out she’s been crushing on me too, and my feelings have come hurtling back like a puck heading for the net2. She’s my doctor and I’m her patientSo we have some hurdles to get through. And I need to convince Doctor Molly Marks that we’re worth the fight. That love is enough.Because this isn’t a game I plan on losing.
author: Lulu Moore
